source.name: Enterprise Blockchain Interoperability Use Case
source.instructions: Which of the following scenarios best illustrates the use of blockchain interoperability for enterprise blockchain integration?

answers.answer: A pharmaceutical company's private blockchain communicates with a public blockchain to verify the authenticity of drug shipments across the supply chain
A financial institution uses a single permissioned blockchain to process all internal transactions
A retail company stores all customer data on a centralized database connected to their e-commerce platform
A manufacturing firm uses IoT devices to track inventory levels without integrating with any blockchain networks
A technology company develops a new cryptocurrency on a standalone blockchain with no cross-chain functionality

source.guidance: The correct answer demonstrates blockchain interoperability in an enterprise setting by showing how a private enterprise blockchain (used by the pharmaceutical company) interacts with a public blockchain. This scenario illustrates the integration of different blockchain systems to enable broader data sharing and verification across platforms, which is a key aspect of enterprise blockchain integration. The other options either involve single blockchain usage, non-blockchain technologies, or scenarios that don't demonstrate interoperability between different blockchain systems.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT evaluate scenarios demonstrating practical applications of blockchain interoperability in enterprise settings
